statements: DELETE FROM learning_paths WHERE student_id = 100 AND learning_style = 'Visual';
DELETE FROM learning_paths WHERE path_id = 1 AND student_id = 100;
DELETE FROM learning_paths WHERE student_id IN (SELECT student_id FROM learning_paths WHERE learning_style = 'Visual') AND preferences->>'difficulty' = 'Advanced';
DELETE FROM courses WHERE category = 'IT' AND course_id = 10;
DELETE FROM student_courses WHERE student_id = 2 AND course_id = 3;
DELETE FROM student_courses WHERE student_id = 1 AND course_id = 101;
